pageProduct.name: Thankyou Botanical Geranium and Rosewood Bath and Body Oil 100ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

To help enrich your skin, we’ve put the good stuff into this bath & body oil, like our special blend of seven plant-based oils and the calming fragrance of geranium and rosewood.

Made with ingredients derived from nature, our bath & body oil will have your skin glowing and smelling oh-so-amazing in no time.

A few drops of this hydrating oil in your bath is enough to de-stress, leave the day behind and soothe your dry skin. Bath time (and you) has never smelled this good.

No bath? No problem. This multi-tasker also functions as a moisturising body oil after your shower - great for locking in moisture during the colder winter months.

We’re all about keeping it real, so we’ve left out nasties like:

Mineral oils
Parabens
Harsh petrochemicals
Synthetic fragrances
Animal derivatives

Made with love in Australia. Not tested on animals and vegan friendly.

Warnings

But first, read this: Path test before use. Store below 25°C. For external use only. Avoid contact with your eyes (if you get some in there, rinse immediately with water). If you experience irritation after use, please discontinue.

 

Common Uses

Baths, moisturising, massages

Ingredients

Olive oil, vitamin E, crambe abyssinica seed oil and phytosterols, coconut oil, avocado oil, calendula flower extract, rosehip oil, geranium oil, rosewood oil, fragrance (natural).

 

Directions

With a pump of oil, rub your hands together and massage into your skin, or add 2-5 pumps to your bath as desired.
